page.title: 01Out And About In Wootton
page.content: The area we are covering is mostly countryside.There are two villages in our block namely Wootton and Glympton.Their population are seven hundred and one hundred respectively.There is a general stores/post office in both villages.Most of the land is argricultural,and the main crops are wheat and barley.There is only one primary school in our area,this is in Wootton.The number on roll is thirty eight children the village also has a small playgroup.Each village has a large C of E church.The parish of Wootton is three miles from the historic town of Woodstock and ten miles from the county town of Oxford.The area is in a beautiful part of England. {
